author: amiller@businessinsider.com (Anna Medaris Miller), Anna Medaris Miller
title: 'The way down is much slower than the way up': WHO announces 6 criteria countries need to meet before lifting lockdown restrictions
description: Costfoto/Barcroft Media via Getty Images During a media briefing on COVID-19 April 13, Dr. Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus, the World Health Organization's director general, said the pandemic with decelerate much more slowly than it accelerated. He laid out six cr…
content:
As some countries experience declines in COVID-19 cases and deaths, their leaders and citizens are eager to get back to work, school, and play. 
But restrictions need to be lifted slowly and strategically in order to successfully re-enter a new normal rather… [+2362 chars]
